items.translated_title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin
items.content: The agency already opened an investigation in October over Waymo's performance around school buses. Waymo said it issued a software update to its fleet to improve performance.

items.translated_title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
items.content: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

items.translated_title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head
items.content: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.

items.translated_title: Anthropic CEO weighs in on AI bubble talk and risk-taking among competitors
items.content: Anthropic's CEO shared his thoughts on the economics of AI and the risk-taking of competitors, saying some were "YOLO-ing" with regard to spending.

items.translated_title: Musk says new Tesla software allows texting and driving, which is illegal in most states
items.content: Texting while driving is banned in nearly every state, even with the use of advanced driver-assistance systems like Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) software.

items.translated_title: Celebrity Co-Founders Not Required: Building Influence from Scratch
items.content: Alltroo co-founders Kyle Rudolph and Jon Walburg share how they transformed their pro-athlete star power into a fundraising platform that allows their community the ability to donate to a variety of organization and win high-value prizes. In this episode of Build Mode, they reveal how they leveraged their networks to disrupt the charitable giving industry, […]

items.creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Sanctioned spyware maker Intellexa had direct access to government espionage victims, researchers say
items.content: Based on a leaked video, security researchers alleged that Intellexa staffers have remote live access to their customers' surveillance systems, allowing them to see hacking targets’ personal data.

items.title: Amazon’s new Kindle Scribe and Kindle Scribe Colorsoft launch on December 10
items.creator: Aisha Malik
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Amazon’s new Kindle Scribe and Kindle Scribe Colorsoft launch on December 10
items.content: The new Kindle Scribe has a larger 11-inch glare-free display, is just 5.4 mm thick, and weighs only 400 g. It’s also 40% faster when writing or turning pages.

items.translated_title: California’s ban on self-driving trucks could soon be over
items.content: Revised rules in California would allow self-driving trucks to test on public highways. The rules also close a loophole allowing police to issue tickets for driverless vehicles.

items.translated_title: Why Day One Ventures’ Masha Bucher thinks VCs and storytelling go hand-in-hand
items.content: Day One Ventures' Masha Bucher doesn't just invest in startups — she also tells their stories. Her integrated model aligns incentives and proves conviction matters more than contracts.
